text:
Strict security with facial recognition upon entrance and exit at lobby and guardhouse, security escort us all the way to designated parking lot which located beside lift entrance, very convenient for load and unloading our stuff. spacious living hall and dining hall for Homestay with 2 rooms and 3 bathrooms.
Stay 2 nights cost rm840 include cleaning fee and city tax

Nice place for living, strategic location
Near Educity, Legoland

I love the house, cozy & the swimming pool.

Highly recommended, I will definitely miss this place.
Peaceful, safe and convenient place to stay for family, student and foreigner. 1 min walking to Mydin, Nearby Edu City, Eco Botanics, Medini, Puteri Harbour and Singapore second link.

Just few kilometers drive to Singapore 2nd link. The interior are really big, cozy environment, elevator, pool, gym, and  visitorâ€™s parking spot make this condominium one of the best in the area.
This is a very classy and friendly place to live

Spacious units... Mine is a 2 bedroom and 2.5 washrooms unit. Serviceable kitchen, laundry area and storeroom. Gated area with smart tag-type entry, large-ish swimming pool and gymnasium. Quite well kept maintenance-wise, though covered parking area gets quite dark i.e. Could use more lighting.. Mydin shopping just a stone's throw away (but driving there entails a lengthy u-turn). Next to it is a Subway and 23hr mamak restaurant. All in all a very pleasant place to live in.
